name: Tweetmatic
overview:
Tweetmatic™ helps you use Twitter in your business. We all know that social media has become an integral part of any small business. But it can be time-consuming. And distracting.

That’s where Tweetmatic comes in. You authorize us to post updates and gather information on your Twitter accounts and we help you construct “Tweet Pools” (that’s what we call a list of educational valuable content that we store for you and meter out to your Twitter accounts on a schedule that you set up).

Your Tweetmatic Tweet Pools can be simple: one tweet that just says “Good Morning!” and we’ll send it out for you on the morning you specify. Or (what we prefer you do) is a list of all of the valuable content that we know you have sitting around your office. Spend some time building a list of tweets for us. Store them in your Tweetmatic Tweet Pool. Set your schedule. And let us take care of the rest.
